results.title: The Merchant of Venice (Perspective)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Shakespeare in Perspective Series”.
Designed to give greater understanding of the play by placing it in its historical and social context and by stressing its relevance for a modern day audience. Perspective offered by Wolf Mankowitz.

results.title: Slide fasteners
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sewing”.
Shows how to set in slide fasteners; explains why the concealed side openings in dresses and skirts are purposely designed for the side of the garment, and why in others the opening is made in the centre front, or centre back.
results.description:

results.title: Pattern interpretation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sewing”.
Discusses such problems as the interpretation of markings on various well-known commercial patterns; how to determine pattern size, yardage required, and the interpretation of pattern instructions.
